title: The Newfoundlanders: voices from the sea
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Magder Film Productions and Zale Magder
brief_description: This is a film about Newfoundland roots, culture and its present-day position in Canada as a significant maritime region community and as an important but little-known part of our history.
creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, Magder Film Productions and Zale Magder
description: This is a film about Newfoundland roots, culture and its present-day position in Canada as a significant maritime region community and as an important but little-known part of our history.
